data.event: Before 1804 Belmont was known as Hordern and was part of the upper part of the township of Sharples in the parish of Bolton le Moors.

event.title: a factory fire several years ago

data.event: Following a factory fire several years ago a housing estate was developed with houses designed to look traditional.

event.title: was built at the end of 1849

data.event: The parish church of St Peter was built at the end of 1849 and consecrated on 1 April 1850.
The parish church of St Peter was built at the end of 1849 and consecrated on 1 April 1850.
